Message:
Before I knew it,
I had grown arrogant,

believing that I was
the only one who could
fulfill this mission.

I naively approached
the altar—the place
closest to where
the demons lay in wait.

But, I did not destroy
a single one.

Instead, a demon stole
my body away from me...

Ahh... How could
I be so foolish...

But, even with my
body stolen away,
my soul still
belongs to me.

If I refuse to submit...
If I firmly hold on
to my heart,
I should be able to
take my body back...!

Sensing my determination,
the demon inside
my body sneered.

“It’s time you know
what true hell is.”

Then, he used my hands,
and began ripping my
loved ones away from me...
